# Plots

## Volcano plot

```{}
```

```{r}
gravier_estimates |> 
        drop_na() |> 
        mutate(log10 = -log10(p.value)) |> 
        ggplot(aes(x = estimate, y = log10)) +
        geom_point(aes(color = is_significant), alpha = 0.5) +
        geom_text_repel(
        aes(color = is_significant, label = if_else(is_significant == "yes", gene, NA_character_)),
        size = 3,
        show.legend = FALSE,
        max.overlaps = Inf
        ) +
        labs(
                title = "Genes Associated with Early Metastasis in Small Node-Negative Breast Carcinoma",
                subtitle = "highlighted in turquoise were significant after multiple testing correction",
                y = "-log10(p)",
                x = "Estimate",
                caption = "data from DOI: 10.1002/gcc.20820"
        ) +
        guides(color = "none") +
        theme_minimal()
```
